query:
UPDATE mods
            SET status = $1
            FROM delphi_report_issues dri
            INNER JOIN delphi_reports dr ON dr.id = dri.report_id
            INNER JOIN files f ON f.id = dr.file_id
            INNER JOIN versions v ON v.id = f.version_id
            INNER JOIN mods m ON v.mod_id = m.id
            WHERE dri.id = $2
